track.name: Hand On The Glock
comments: LA LA LA LA  LA LA   LA  LAAAAAAAAAA
HAHAHAAH. The security guard at work just came in and told me he could see me leaping about the office on the security camera to this tune.
Fuck work. Im going home to get ma glock and get blunted. Should be able to get my swaggger on before the wife and kids get home. LOL.
cuz a bullet proof aint sh*& # when the infared is pointing at your head!!!
tried to jack me but homie got shot! haha
disappointed they didnt play at summercamp

remember 91 like it was yesterday-the hills first one came out round the same time as rage against the machines first one(or was it 92???) anyway it was a good time for music.dont even bother to turn on the radio anymore....
